entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
